CustomField.formula: CASE(CCMI__Status_Enum__c, 2, 'Green', -1, 'N/A', IF(CCMI__End__c < TODAY(), 'Red', IF(CCMI__Status_Enum__c == 0 && CCMI__Start__c < TODAY(), 'Yellow', 'Green') ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The health of the Task as determined by the Status, Start Date, and End Date of the Task. See the 'Timeline Health Reason' for more information.
CustomField.label: Timeline Health
